com.github.cuter44.wxpay.resps

类 WxpayResponseBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.cuter44.wxpay.resps.WxpayResponseBase
  • 直接已知子类:
    Notify, OrderQueryResponse, RefundQueryResponse, RefundResponse, UnifiedOrderResponse

    public class WxpayResponseBase
extends java.lang.Object
    General response passed by req.execute() or alipay callback/redirect gateways Actually reqs/gateways passed excatly response type, i.e. sub-class of this. I'm recommending you to see the sub-class javadoc... to help you write elegant code. Notice that downloadbill's response does not inherit this class. That's ass hole.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • WxpayResponseBase

        public WxpayResponseBase()

      • WxpayResponseBase

        public WxpayResponseBase(java.lang.String xml)
                  throws WxpayProtocolException,
                         WxpayException
        This construstor automatically parse input as xml, and output properties. Meanwhile, detect the fails. Notice that Properties does not support hierachy, so it go down if tag names are non-unique. It is raw in present. If it really happens, a new response type and parser should be defined to cope with that.
        抛出:
        WxpayProtocolException
        WxpayException

      • WxpayResponseBase

        public WxpayResponseBase(java.io.InputStream xml)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        This construstor automatically parse input as xml, and output properties. Meanwhile, detect the fails. Notice that Properties does not support hierachy, so it go down if tag names are non-unique. It is raw in present. If it really happens, a new response type and parser should be defined to cope with that.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • verify

        public boolean verify(java.util.Properties conf)
               throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        verify response sign
        返回:
        true if passed (i.e. response content should be trusted), otherwise false
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • verifySign

        protected boolean verifySign(java.util.Properties conf)
                      throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                             java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        子类应该实现这个方法以验证签名 SUB-CLASS MUST IMPLEMENT THIS METHOD TO BE CALLBACKED. Default behavior do no verification, i.e. always return true. A typical implemention should be return(super.verifySign(this.keysParamName, conf) where );
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException

      • verifySign

        protected boolean verifySign(java.util.List<java.lang.String> paramNames,
                 java.util.Properties conf)
                      throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • sign

        protected java.lang.String sign(java.util.List<java.lang.String> paramNames)
                         throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                java.lang.IllegalStateException
        参数:
        paramNames - key names to submit, in dictionary order
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

        caculate sign according to wxp-spec
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if your runtime does not support utf-8.
